usage.cn: 时间几乎会愈合所有事情。请给时间一点时间。
usage.eng: Time heals almost everything. Give time time.

usage.cn: 想法廉价得随处可见, 最初的想法只是事业的一部分,几乎微不足道。真正的问题在于你执行得有多好。——《rework》
usage.eng: Ideas are cheap and plentiful. The original pitch idea is such a small part of a business that it's almost negligible. The real question is how well you execute.
